General.Name: Ningbo Bird Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Bird Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells mobile phones and motherboards in China. It offers Android, bar, qwerty, and clamshell phones; and tablets. The company exports its products to approximately 60 countries, including France, Italy, other European countries, Russia, India, Mexico, Brazil, and other countries. Ningbo Bird Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Fenghua, China.
General.Address: No. 999, Dacheng East Road, Fenghua, China, 315500
